text: Ra tyasa avasthākō smaraṇa gara jaba timī thōrai thiyau, dhartīmā nirbala thiyau, bhayabhīta avasthāmā rahanthyau ki arulē timīharūlā'ī kahīṁ naṣṭa nagarihālun ani allāhalē timīlā'ī śaraṇa diyō ra āphnō sahāyatālē timīlā'ī śakti pradāna garyō ra rāmrā rāmrā kurāharū diyō jasabāṭa timīlē usakō ābhāra prakaṭa gara
